trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati di evento che viene utilizzati come un oggetto parametro nella <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> gli eventi della radice <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene esposta come il `e` parametro il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento viene generato prima di una nuova visualizzazione, in seguito l'utente finale facendo clic e trascinando in un'area grafico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>evento viene generato subito dopo la creazione della nuova visualizzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: È importante notare che la posizione e le dimensioni di una vista non può essere impostate nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventi perché in questo caso la vista è già stata creata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: La classe ViewEventArgs contiene le proprietà seguenti: - il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>proprietà, che viene usata per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>dell'oggetto in cui viene visualizzata la vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>proprietà ottiene il nome dell'area del grafico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Impostare anche altre proprietà area grafico.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>proprietà, che viene usata per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>oggetto a cui è associata la visualizzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il tipo di asse, che può essere X, Y, X2 o Y2, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Impostare anche altre proprietà dell'asse.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>proprietà, che rappresenta la nuova posizione di una vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>proprietà che rappresenta la nuova dimensione di una vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>proprietà, che rappresenta l'unità di misura per le dimensioni di una vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di classe con l'oggetto specificato axis e newPosition parametri.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: L'asse della visualizzazione della scala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: La posizione iniziale della visualizzazione della scala di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di classe con l'oggetto specificato axis , newPosition , newSize e newSizeType parametri.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: L'asse della visualizzazione della scala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: La posizione iniziale della visualizzazione della scala di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: Le nuove dimensioni di visualizzazione di scala.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: L'unità di misura per le dimensioni della visualizzazione della scala di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> oggetto a cui appartiene una vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene esposta nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>gli eventi della radice <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata per:-determinare il tipo di asse, X, X2, Y2 o Y, l'evento viene generato, utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Consente di ottenere e impostare le proprietà asse, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta l'asse che appartiene a una visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> oggetto a cui appartiene una vista.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene esposta nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>gli eventi della radice <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>proprietà può essere utilizzata per determinare l'area del grafico a cui appartiene la vista, accedendo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata anche per ottenere e impostare proprietà area grafico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta l'area del grafico a cui appartiene una visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la nuova posizione di una visualizzazione lungo un asse.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene esposta nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>gli eventi della radice <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>dell'oggetto e rappresenta la nuova posizione di una vista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà NewPosition può essere impostata su un nuovo valore nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento, ma non può essere impostata su un nuovo valore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventi perché in questo caso la vista è già stata creata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Il NewPosition viene sempre misurata come valore dell'asse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta la posizione di una visualizzazione lungo un asse, che è la parte inferiore di una visualizzazione verticale o la posizione a sinistra di una visualizzazione orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le dimensioni di una visualizzazione lungo un asse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta le dimensioni di una visualizzazione lungo un asse.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: La dimensione è l'altezza della visualizzazione verticale o la larghezza della visualizzazione orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'unità di misura per le nuove dimensioni di una vista.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, l'unità di misura per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>proprietà viene automaticamente determinata dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo e può essere un numero o un giorno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Tenere presente che la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>proprietà viene sempre misurata come valore dell'asse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che se si imposta in modo esplicito il tipo di dimensione, il tipo corrisponda all'asse cui appartiene la barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: In altre parole, non si specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>Se l'asse non utilizza <xref:System.DateTime>valori.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>proprietà può essere impostata su un nuovo valore nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento, ma non può essere impostata su un nuovo valore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>eventi perché la vista è già stata creata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che rappresenta l'unità di misura per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>proprietà, che rappresenta la larghezza o altezza di una visualizzazione di dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.
